  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82346</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82346</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Making copper wires move</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Treffen der kupfernen Leitungen Maßnahme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Entreprendre la démarche de cuivre de fils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo o movimento de cobre dos fios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare movimento di rame dei legare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή της κίνησης καλωδίων χαλκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación del movimiento de cobre de los 
alambres</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of a series of illustrations demonstrating a way of making a copper wire move using electric currents and magnets.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von einer Reihe Abbildungen, die eine 
Methode des Bildens einer kupfernen Leitung zeigen, bewegen Sie mit 
elektrischen Strömen und Magneten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord d'une série d'illustrations démontrant 
une voie de faire un fil de cuivre déplacez-vous à l'aide des 
courants et des aimants électriques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de uma série das ilustrações que
demonstram uma maneira de fazer um fio de cobre mova-se usando 
correntes e ímãs elétricos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di una serie di illustrazioni che 
dimostrano un modo di fare un legare di rame muovasi per mezzo delle 
correnti e dei magneti elettrici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα μιας σειράς απεικονίσεων που καταδεικνύουν έναν
τρόπο μια κίνηση καλωδίων χαλκού που χρησιμοποιεί τα ηλεκτρικούς
ρεύματα και τους μαγνήτες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de una serie de ilustraciones que 
demuestran una manera de hacer un alambre de cobre muévase con 
corrientes y los imanes eléctricos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verkupfern Sie Leitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cuivrez le fil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aimants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">revista o fio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ímãs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rami il legare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magneti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καλώδιο χαλκού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό ρεύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνήτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">revista el alambre con cobre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corriente eléctrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imanes</string>
          </keyword>
